name: Courser Z9-Ember
reasonForDisplacement: Tracking a rogue synth when the Divide storms 'spoke' to him.
personality: Intense, paranoid, convinced the Humming One is sentient.
questHooks: Believes the Humming One is watching the player.
Wants to destroy a FizzCo relay node buried under the Divide.

lore.interpretation: A living entity trapped between timelines.
lore.atomicFizzRumors: Fizz Caps 'whisper' when held near fracture points.
